title: The Power of KM: Harnessing the Extraordinary Value of Knowledge Management
description: The Power of KM provides a clear and concise introduction to Knowledge Management (KM). Brent Hunter explains the basics of Knowledge Management and provides a step-by-step, comprehensive, integrated, holistic and universal KM strategy that can be utilized in any organization. Hunter continues by explaining how Knowledge Management can be used to enrich and optimize our personal lives and at all levels of society. By the time you finish this book, you will learn that knowledge is power, that KM is extraordinarily valuable and how the power of KM can literally change the world.
author: Brent N. Hunter
